name: Vaya
description:
Vayas village was destroyed by unkown evil power. 

To find out and destroy the origin of this catastrophe, she starts an adventure to the cursed kingdom.

But you are not alone... a little ghost is standing by your side and helping you in this situation.

Solve small Puzzels, overcome Jump'n Runs with grapling hook and bring the peace back.

Move Stones

Throw rope on blue cristals

(Jump and press the hook button. If the player touches the ground, the rope will be deactivated)

Use gigants technology to come forward
